642.title: You grant perpetual license to anything you publish

tosdr.case: You grant perpetual license to anything you publish-bad-80
tosdr.tldr: You grant perpetual license to use anything you publish. While the global license expires when you unsubscribe, public content will remain licensed and will not be deleted.

meta.author: Ian McGowan
meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA

689.title: Spotify may transfer and process your data to somewhere outside of your country

tosdr.case: Spotify may transfer and process your data to somewhere outside of your country-bad-50
tosdr.tldr: Spotify may transfer and process your data outside of your home country. This includes potentially a country in which you have fewer legal rights regarding your personal information.

meta.author: Ian McGowan
meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA

695.title: Spotify uses different agreements for special offers and community access

tosdr.case: separate policies for some parts of the service
tosdr.tldr: Special offers and community access to customer service may use different agreements than the EULA. However, these agreements cannot contradict the EULA.

meta.author: Ian McGowan
meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA

713.title: Your data is accessible to trading partners

tosdr.case: personal data is given to third parties
tosdr.tldr: Your data is accessible to any of Spotify's trading partners. In addition, such data isn't expressly defined in the EULA.

meta.author: Ian McGowan
meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA

719.title: Spotify states risks of public information

tosdr.case: info given about risk of publishing your info online
tosdr.tldr: Spotify expressly states the implications of keeping information public, and also that certain specific information (e.g., username, profile picture) may not be able to be made private.

meta.author: Ian McGowan
meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA

tosdr.case: Spotify doesn't guarantee data security-neutral-30
tosdr.tldr: Although Spotify states they are committed to data security, the also state that they cannot guarantee any success in that area.

meta.author: Ian McGowan
meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA

755.title: You can unsubscribe at any time

tosdr.case: you can leave at any time
tosdr.tldr: Spotify provides a link in order to cancel your subscription to their services, which you can do at any time. However, the cancellation takes effect after the last day of the current subscription period, so if you cancel before the end of the subscription period, Spotify will not offer you a refund.

meta.author: Ian McGowan
meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA

771.title: Spotify price changes take effect immediately

tosdr.case: user is notified on the day
tosdr.tldr: Spotify warns you if there is a change in the price of  subscription, but that change is implemented immediately, without delay. This means that if they change the price they day before your renewal, you will be charged the new price.

meta.author: Ian McGowan
meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA

792.title: Spotify informs users of changes to the privacy policy

tosdr.case: user is notified on the day
tosdr.tldr: Spotify informs users through the Service of any material changes to their privacy policy. They recommend users check the privacy policy for an minor changes.

meta.author: Ian McGowan
meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA

798.title: Spotify warns of third party uses

tosdr.case: they educate you about the risks
tosdr.tldr: Spotify takes precautions to prohibit third party applications from attempting to identify you using information Spotify provides them. They also inform you of the possible consequences should you allow this access.

meta.author: Ian McGowan
meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA

tosdr.case: info given about what personal data they collect
tosdr.tldr: Personal data is described in PP §2. However, If you connect to Spotify using Facebook, they will have access to more data.

meta.author: Ian McGowan
meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA

852.title: Spotify can delete your account without telling you

tosdr.case: they can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason
tosdr.tldr: Spotify can close your account without notice, without refund, for any or no reason.

meta.author: Ian McGowan
meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA

855.title: No promise to inform about government requests

tosdr.case: no promise to inform/notify
tosdr.tldr: Spotify does not explicitly state that they will inform users of any law or government requests regarding any personal user information.

meta.author: Ian McGowan
meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA

877.title: Spotify may merge your current personal info with more if you participate in a Special Promotion

tosdr.case: may collect extra data about you in contests
tosdr.tldr: If you participate in a Special Promotion (sweepstakes, contests, surveys), Spotify may ask for certain personal information in addition to what they already have. They may then combine that information with your current file.

meta.author: Ian McGowan
meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA

tosdr.case: no refund policy
tosdr.tldr: Spotify does not offer refunds upon termination of their services, either by you or Spotify.

meta.author: Ian McGowan
meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA

926.title: Spotify defines intended use of your information

tosdr.case: info given about intended use of your information
tosdr.tldr: Spotify may use the information they collect to provide, personalize, and improve your experience; provide customized or localized content and advertising; make sure the Service and products are functioning properly; analyze your use of the Service; communication with you (including promotional emails or messages); promote the Service; and finally, to enforce their Privacy Policy.

meta.author: Ian McGowan
meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA

1012.title: Spotify gives no guarantee for quality of service

tosdr.case: no quality guarantee
tosdr.tldr: There is no guarantee of quality of service. If the service is not delivered to your expectations, you still pay for it to the extent of applicable law.

meta.author: Ian McGowan
meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA

1082.title: The ToS are only translated into a few languages

tosdr.case: translated into only a few languages
tosdr.tldr: Although Spotify allows users to choose their country (Andorra, Australia, Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Monaco, Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom, United States), the terms themselves are only available in English, French, German, and Spanish.

To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA

tosdr.case: third parties may be involved in operating the service
tosdr.tldr: They may need external companies to get the most out of your personal data, in which case they would apply undefined confidentiality policies (which would be consistent with Spotify's Privacy Policy).

meta.author: Ian McGowan

1092.title: Spotify provides limited solutions for software problems

tosdr.case: no quality guarantee
tosdr.tldr: Uninstalling the software is the only possible action for users if they have any problems.
